files.description: Centralizes all artifact/log writing functions and refactors them to build destinations via the shared OUTPUT_DIR helper instead of hardcoded /outputs paths.

missionDescription: Create a single output-path helper (e.g., OUTPUT_DIR defaulting to ./outputs with optional env override) and refactor all writers to use it; add a pytest asserting no absolute /outputs paths are produced in logs or artifacts.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Prevents a known failure mode (attempting absolute /outputs leading to permission issues) and enforces the repo-canonical artifact location requirement (./outputs/), improving determinism and audit di...
projectName: single output-path helper (e.g., OUTPUT_DIR defaulting to ./outputs with optional env override) and refactor all writers to use it; add a pytest asserting no absolute /outputs paths are produced in logs or artifacts.
